name: ETL Data Transformer Agent
description: Transforms raw data fetched from the artifact database (e.g., selects/renames columns, converts types).

authSchemes.description: No authentication required for this agent.

skills.name: Transform Raw Data
skills.description: Loads raw data artifact from DB, transforms it, and saves the result back to DB.

raw_data_artifact_id.description: The database ID of the 'raw_data' artifact to transform.

run_id.description: The unique ID for the current pipeline run.

artifact_db_id.description: The database ID of the created 'transformed_data' artifact.
